top_categories.workout_context: Cohutta Gravel Grinder rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Cohutta Gravel Grinder’s north georgia mountains, cohutta wilderness demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Cohutta Gravel Grinder isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Cohutta Gravel Grinder when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
At 100 miles, Cohutta Gravel Grinder punishes athletes who haven’t trained their body to produce power when glycogen runs low.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Cohutta Gravel Grinder. Make this intensity feel like home.
Cohutta Gravel Grinder’s 9,000ft of climbing demands seated and standing versatility — the ability to change climbing style as gradient and fatigue dictate.
Cohutta Gravel Grinder’s georgia cohutta mountain gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Cohutta Gravel Grinder — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Blended sessions combine endurance with intensity spikes — exactly what Cohutta Gravel Grinder’s georgia cohutta mountain gravel delivers on race day.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for Cohutta Gravel Grinder’s 9,000ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.
Every session at Cohutta Gravel Grinder intensity builds on this aerobic foundation — the endurance base is the soil everything else grows in.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Cohutta Gravel Grinder’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Cohutta Gravel Grinder requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on georgia cohutta mountain gravel to build confidence. Expect: north georgia mountains, cohutta wilderness, 100-mile distance.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 100 miles of georgia cohutta mountain gravel in Chatsworth, Georgia.
